languages.text: "С тех пор, как Лорд-капитан к Калькасару наведал{mf|ся|ась}, чувство у меня такое... непростое. И неприятное. Словно... не все было сказано".
"Ever since the Lord Captain paid a visit to Calcazar, I've had this... uneasy feeling. It feels wrong. As if... not everything has been said."
languages.original_text: "С тех пор, как Лорд-капитан к Калькасару наведал{mf|ся|ась}, чувство у меня такое... непростое. И неприятное. Словно... не все было сказано".

traits.locale_text: "Ever since the Lord Captain paid a visit to Calcazar, I've had this... uneasy feeling. It feels wrong. As if... not everything has been said."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ever since the Lord Captain paid a visit to Calcazar, I've had this... uneasy feeling. It feels wrong. As if... not everything has been said."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ever since the Lord Captain paid a visit to Calcazar, I've had this... uneasy feeling. It feels wrong. As if... not everything has been said."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ever since the Lord Captain paid a visit to Calcazar, I've had this... uneasy feeling. It feels wrong. As if... not everything has been said."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “自从舰长大人拜访卡尔卡扎之后，我就一直有这种……不安的感觉，感觉哪里有什么不对。就好像……还有什么别的东西被有意隐瞒起来了一样。”
languages.original_text: "Ever since the Lord Captain paid a visit to Calcazar, I've had this... uneasy feeling. It feels wrong. As if... not everything has been said."

traits.locale_text: “自从舰长大人拜访卡尔卡扎之后，我就一直有这种……不安的感觉，感觉哪里有什么不对。就好像……还有什么别的东西被有意隐瞒起来了一样。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Depuis la visite {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} à Calcazar, j'ai comme un... mauvais pressentiment. Quelque chose cloche. Comme si... tout n'avait pas été dit. »
languages.original_text: "Ever since the Lord Captain paid a visit to Calcazar, I've had this... uneasy feeling. It feels wrong. As if... not everything has been said."

traits.locale_text: « Depuis la visite {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} à Calcazar, j'ai comme un... mauvais pressentiment. Quelque chose cloche. Comme si... tout n'avait pas été dit. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Desde que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán visitó a Calcazar tengo una... sensación de desasosiego. Algo no encaja. Es como... si hubiera algo que no se ha dicho».
languages.original_text: "Ever since the Lord Captain paid a visit to Calcazar, I've had this... uneasy feeling. It feels wrong. As if... not everything has been said."

traits.locale_text: «Desde que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán visitó a Calcazar tengo una... sensación de desasosiego. Algo no encaja. Es como... si hubiera algo que no se ha dicho».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンがカルカサルを訪問してからずっと、こんな…不安な気持ちなのよ。変ね。なんていうか…言葉足らずというか」
languages.original_text: "Ever since the Lord Captain paid a visit to Calcazar, I've had this... uneasy feeling. It feels wrong. As if... not everything has been said."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンがカルカサルを訪問してからずっと、こんな…不安な気持ちなのよ。変ね。なんていうか…言葉足らずというか」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Seit der Lord Captain Calcazar einen Besuch abgestattet hat, habe ich so ein ... ungutes Gefühl. Es fühlt sich falsch an. Als sei ... nicht alles gesagt werden."
languages.original_text: "Ever since the Lord Captain paid a visit to Calcazar, I've had this... uneasy feeling. It feels wrong. As if... not everything has been said."

traits.locale_text: "Seit der Lord Captain Calcazar einen Besuch abgestattet hat, habe ich so ein ... ungutes Gefühl. Es fühlt sich falsch an. Als sei ... nicht alles gesagt werden."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Ever since the Lord Captain paid a visit to Calcazar, I've had this... uneasy feeling. It feels wrong. As if... not everything has been said."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, yanına gidip Calcazar'la görüştüğünden beri içimde bir huzursuzluk var. Bir şeyler yanlış. Sanki söylenmeyen şeyler varmış gibi."
languages.original_text: "Ever since the Lord Captain paid a visit to Calcazar, I've had this... uneasy feeling. It feels wrong. As if... not everything has been said."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, Calcazar'ın yanına gittiğinden beri içimde bir huzursuzluk var. Bir şeyler yanlış. Sanki söylenmeyen şeyler varmış gibi."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
